channel.title: Quick Client Question
channel.description:
What type of client would work best to be turned into a web client? i already now how to turn it into a web client just wondering which clients work best.
Thanks

item.title: Quick Client Question
item.dc:creator: @death_t_d death t d
item.description:
@death_t_d wrote:

see the problem is that i have used prevoius clients and some say “conenction error -retrying in 30” and then another time with a different client it worked fine. It just wouldnt work when uploaded to the site cause it would jsut come up with a white blank screen with no like errors

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Client Question
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

every client should work just fine, although you should chose the client wich has the most stuff packed in the cache, so it doesnt have to dl alot

Read full topic
